messages.message: Will open PRs also be affected?

Nope! They'll still be mergeable as-is. This change primarily affects CICD pipelines - so if you have an open PR that still needs deployment to a sandbox or otherwise built, you'll need to reopen that PR from the un-forked branch.

:wave: This change is in place for sandbox builds now!

Thanks to \@Arek for taking care of the ICC changes!
You'll now see the following when creating / updating sandboxes, and will get an error as follows if you manage to slip one past the gate guards. :slightly_smiling_face:

Let me know in <#C035SLYCJ9X|> if you run into issues.

Have a great weekend!
